name: Tara! Laro!
description:
Tara! Laro! is 2-player versus party game that aims to feature Filipino games in a medium that is more interactive than text and video.  Get to learn tidbits of information about the Filipino games themselves as well as enjoy playing them with a friend! 

Created by:

Daniel James Rodriguez - Programmer

Levin Gasmeña - 3D and 2D artist

Special Thanks to:

Ira "Nico" Mendoza - Music and SFX

THIS GAME IS ONLY PLAYABLE ON WINDOWS PCs
